definition_zh: 以恶寒、肢冷、喜热、舌淡、脉迟等为主征，反映阳气不足或阴寒偏盛的倾向。
definition_en: A pattern characterized by aversion to cold cold limbs preference for warmth pale tongue and slow pulse indicating yang deficiency or excess cold.

definition_zh: 以发热、口渴、面赤/咽红、舌红、脉数等为主征，反映实热或阴虚内热的倾向。
definition_en: A pattern with fever thirst red face/throat red tongue and rapid pulse indicating excess heat or internal heat due to yin deficiency.
